author: Jade Bremner
title: Tornado Pictures Show Devastation to Homes Across Mississippi, Louisiana, Georgia, Tennessee and Alabama
description: During the wide-ranging coronavirus stay-at-home orders, many have lost their homes and around 750,000 customers are left without power across 10 states.
content:
At least 19 people have lost their lives due to severe storms and tornadoes that tore through Southern states on Easter Sunday. The extreme weather will continue on Easter Monday, according to the National Weather Service.
States affected include Tennessee, … [+3773 chars]
